main event: An observation of 8 to 10 elongated objects traveling in a formation near Dimond Milk Station on July 15, 1954.
interesting points: The objects were sighted 5 miles NE of a specific location., The formation was described as a 1/4 V shape., The objects were observed traveling East to West-Southwest., They appeared for about 6 to 10 seconds before disappearing., The objects were elongated in shape and were not emitting light.
